review.comment: Prosper walks the walk when it comes to digital marketing and brand! He is so passionate about not just his business, but yours as the client too. So glad I made the jump into professional SEO services, as I'm already ranking after a few weeks and had my first phone call that wasn't a referral or found me via other channels. He has a system to make it all easy and not overwhelming. Thanks Prosper and team!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for trusting the process.

review.comment: A client of mine had her website hacked a couple of times and had been blacklisted by Google. She had previously had a Page 1 Google ranking and got most of her new clients through her website. When the work dried up she knew that there was a problem but had no idea what or how bad it was until Prosper did some investigations and advised on the issues with the site and her rankings. He assisted in getting the issues cleaned up and getting the site bank into Google's good books and I have a very happy client who is back in business! The experience of working with Prosper Taruvinga and Livelong Digital has been a fantastic one for me and also for my client who has had several website "experts" tell her there was nothing wrong with her site. These guys are my go-to authority now for everything SEO. If you are thinking about using them for your SEO/digital jobs I'm happy to be contacted directly if you need a more in-depth recommendation. THANK YOU Prosper and team, love your work 😍
review.review_reply: Dear Karen, Thank you for your nice and detailed reply. It feels incredible joy to hear such experiences. I really appreciate your words!

review.comment: Prosper and his team are genuine and motivated to help businesses achieve their goals. They go above and beyond to ensure that you are happy with their work and, check in and take feedback along the way. Prosper pushes the boundaries and make things happen!
review.review_reply: Such a pleasure working on your business. Thank you for trusting the process.

review.comment: I had one of the best calls with Prosper last week i think iv'e had in a very long time, his approach to business and connecting with me was one i haven't really experienced before and it absolutely changed everything. I am extremely grateful we connected and i have a feeling my business is going to explode from what he shared with me to what i was able to implement and set in motion. Highly recommended, you wont be disappointed. And Prosper you got the moves Man...
review.review_reply: I appreciate this- Thank you so much.

review.comment: Prosper and Livelong digital are extremely professional and have provided an exceptional service.He goes above and beyond  in delivery of service.He is also a real pleasure to work with.I would definitely recommend him for SEO and digital marketing
review.review_reply: Kind words Doc- Thank you for trusting the process.

review.comment:
We engaged the services of Prosper at Livelong Digital when our business was just launching and his service and expertise has been amazing.  He re-designed our website to make it Google and SEO friendly and educated us along the way with all things Google.
Prosper goes the extra mile to assist his clients business and truly wants to see you succeed.
If you're looking for a company that will go above and beyond to help you succeed we highly recommend Livelong Digital
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for trusting the process.

review.comment: Thank you Prosper for helping us get to number on on Google in our category. Your service has been amazing and you have kept us up to date constantly.  I would highly recommend you to others looking for an SEO.
review.review_reply: I appreaciate this, thank you so much.

review.comment: They provide an excellent service and ongoing support trying their best to support my SEO campaign and I highly recommend their services to anyone looking for a good SEO provider.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for this. Happy to see the results you are getting.

review.comment: This guy ran away with my money and stopped communication. I worked for him on good faith and he kept promising he will pay but instead paying he just kept running and ignoring me.. He actually do not have any of his own fulfillment team and even when he outsource he is not bothered to pay his due... You cannot' run away with my money.
review.review_reply: Thank you very much for this review. In the future, It will be best when you actually do have a great service and deliver on your promises, people will be more than happy to pay for quality. Wish you all the best in your business. Thanks once again.

review.comment: Prosper really worked hard to understand my business and continually honed his actions to ensure results. We went from invisible to page one on Google. He is a man of his word and I can highly recommend his organisation.
I've never meet someone who was so driven to get me outstanding results so quickly!

What we enjoyed the most about working with Livelong Digital on our SEO is not just the results but their client onboarding process and the regular communication.

Thanks Prosper and the team for everything. I can't recommend Livelong enough.
I highly recommend the services of Livelong Digital.  They really care about their clients, and go over and above to deliver what they commit to, plus more.

Prosper and the entire Livelong Digital team are awesome to work with. Not only is Prosper's energy infectious, they're quick to get to work and incredible at providing suggestions that could enhance my ability to be found online. I'd definitely recommend Livelong Digital to any business needing SEO from an engaged service partner

Prosper and his team at Livelong Digital truley take care of you. Their services go beyond SEO, with Prosper consistently keeping in touch, making suggestions, and giving referrals to help his clients' businesses grow. While there are many SEO companies out there, Livelong Digital shows visible results, keeping you in the loop with where they are at and what they are doing. I highly recommend giving Prosper and his team a go.
Livelong Digital are a company that listens and cares. These guys deliver awesome results.

Prosper and his team are great to work with and have got our company fantastic results. We see ourselves on page 1 of Google for all our major keywords and this leads to a lot of inbound enquiries. Prosper is really proactive and always goes the extra mile for us.  Highly HIGHLY recommended!
Prosper is incredibly supportive of thought-leaders and very good at keeping you in the loop as he does what he's great at.

Prosper and his team have been helping me with my blog posts and SEO. In the couple of months that we have been working together we can see a marked improvement in my ranking. Very easy to work with extremely cost effective for me. Thanks Prosper and team for all your good work and advise.
